summary: The young adolescent girl Jenna is turning into a young woman whilst her mother is dying. It is difficult for her, therefore, to admit that she is afraid of losing her mother. Instead, she ... See full summary »
cast: Josefine Mattsson|Mika Berndtsdotter Ahlén|Annika Hallin|Anki Lidén|Samuel Haus|Nina Christensen|Madeleine Ekman|Christer Fjällström|Deborah Fronko|Charlie Gustafsson|Johan Hallström|Marcus Jansson|Tova Johansson|Kim Lantz|Måns Nathanaelson|Lena Nilsson|Jonas Ohlsson|Rafael Petersson|Judith Rindeskog|Paolo Sappei
title: I taket lyser stjärnorna
